data.description:
# Learn to Dance Salsa in VR and Mixed Reality - For Beginners

Step into a place where the timeless art of dance meets modern innovation, and the vibrant world of salsa comes alive.

# Content

- The course is designed for complete beginners but can be enjoyed by all.  
- It covers foundational steps and techniques of salsa (linear salsa "on 1").  
- Lessons are taught in English.

# Key Features

- **Learn From The Best:** Master instructors Rodrigo Cortazar and Asya Sonina will guide you through an entire beginner salsa program in stunning life-like fidelity.

- **AI Dance Partner:** Engage with a first-of-its-kind virtual partner, powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence that can lead or follow you.

- **Motion Analysis:** A state-of-the-art motion analysis system provides comprehensive feedback on your performance, and adapts the exercises to your skill level.

- **Mixed Reality:** Practice at home in passthrough mode, so you can see your full body, or even dance in front of the mirror.

At The New Salsa Academy, we believe everyone can become an amazing salsa dancer through the joy of learning new skills. Rodrigo and Asya are dedicated to guiding you through every step, turn, and twist, in a fun and interactive approach. Here at the academy, you'll find the freedom and support to explore the joy of salsa dancing.

Join us and unlock the dancer within!
